with.parent: cannot specify peer when key is not part of an object

without.parent: cannot specify peer when key is not part of an object

xor.parent: cannot specify peer when key is not part of an object
xor.missing: at least one of {{key}} {{value}} is required

or.parent: cannot specify peer when key is not part of an object

rename.parent: cannot rename when key is not part of an object
rename.multiple: cannot rename {{key}} because multiple renames are disabled and target {{value}} already used in a rename
rename.override: cannot rename {{key}} because override is disabled and target {{value}} exists

validate.allowOnly: the value of {{key}} must be one of {{value}}

array.base: the value of {{key}} must be an array
array.includes: the {{key}} array value in position {{pos}} does not match any of the allowed types
array.includes-single: the {{key}} array value in position {{pos}} fails because {{reason}}
array.excludes: the value {{value}} in {{key}} cannot violates exclusion rule {{pos}}
array.min: the length of {{key}} must include at least {{value}} items
array.max: the length of {{key}} must include less than (or equal to) {{value}} items
array.length: the length of {{key}} must include {{value}} items

boolean.base: the value of {{key}} must be a boolean

date.base: the value of {{key}} must be a number of milliseconds or valid date string
date.min: the value of {{key}} must be larger than or equal to {{value}}
date.max: the value of {{key}} must be less than or equal to {{value}}

function.base: the value of {{key}} must be a Function

object.base: the value of {{key}} must be an object

string.token: {{key}}只能包含字母数字及下划线
string.regex: the value of {{key}} must match the regular expression {{value}}
string.isoDate: the value of {{key}} must be a valid ISO 8601 date
string.guid: the value of {{key}} must be a valid GUID
